tool_description: This API detects image image after processing, where the business card appears cropped and enhanced from the original image.
name: Crop Business Cards
title: Crop Business Cards

api_list.name: Crop a business card image
api_list.description: The image after processing, where the business card appears cropped and enhanced from the original image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crop-business-cards.p.rapidapi.com/crop_business_card"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crop-business-cards.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crop-business-cards.p.rapidapi.com/crop_business_card"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crop-business-cards.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
